* Biomass cleared his throat as he waited, his tenticles spreading out 
infront, to the sides and behind him again, snaking around Swift's feet 
until their tips touched the water.
The feel of the water was more comforting then the feeling of sand under 
him, it felt nice and it also carried his massive weight better.
But he saw Perndabot notice how he reacted to the missile launcher and 
quickly tfed into robot mode, standing almost as tall as Perndabot...save 5 
ft.
Nue'e looked up at Perndabot when he looked down at her before, flashing him 
a smile but now she stood behind him and had a full view of the IF.
She leaned back a bit and touched her finger to the back of his knee, trying 
to get his attention. She wantred to know about the ship, the Iron Fist.
It was part of her nature.
Biomass nodded.*

" Thank you."

..........................

* Ruffling through the undergrowth he made his way towards water, stopping 
here and there to dig up the occasional root his beast mode detected. 
Munching them down he continues on his way until his nose picked up the 
scent of water and he followed it to a small pond.
Tremmer (since Yan gave away the name I was keeping secret for a while, 
might as well get it out in the open) felt his way with his diggers until 
they felt wet and he bent his head to lap at the water. (diggers are claws).
But moment later he was surprised to hear someone behind him and he turned 
his head towards the sound. With his nose alone he could tell that the 
person was a transformer, male, a Maximal and armed.
Tremmer cocked his head to the side and scratched behind that ear, moving to 
stand on his two back legs, always facing this new person.*

" What's goin on 'er?" *he asked, voice questioning but friendly. Deep and 
smooth.*
